item.title: prompt
item.description: My prompt shows the runtime of the last command and a compact CWD (current work directory). ss_time4prompt.png

item.title: func
item.description: This is the power of the bash shell, you can write small functions to make using the shell easier. lb I found this one on the LinuxBBQ forums it adds the last command to a logfile. Very handy. adda Adds a new permanent alias. Example: adda dwn cd ~/Downloads this will add, alias dwn='~/Downloads' to ~/.bash/alias and reloads ~/.bashrc so you can use the alias immediately. apti/gemi/pipi install packages and log package name.

item.title: misc
item.description: Random options, most from the default .bashrc file.
